definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
douzhi, fermented drink made from ground mung beans/soy milk
milk from a woman's breast/milk (used in the names of dishes to indicate white sauce)
dashi (soup stock used in Japanese cuisine) (orthographic borrowing from Japanese)

sentences.english: By linking Micro-computer and the 721-Spectrophotometre together, the automatic operation of the 721-Spectrophotometre is realized.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用微型計算機與721型訂光光度汁相聯帆。

sentences.english: Drinking potato juice every day can ease indigestion, a new study has found.
sentences.chinese: 一項新的調查，每天喝土豆汁可以消化不良的症狀。

sentences.english: Iberico ham, fine herbs croutons, Mediterranean Caesar dressing.
sentences.chinese: 伊比利亞火腿，香草麪包丁，地中海沙拉汁。

sentences.english: Serve cold sliced pork with garlic soya sauce as a dip.
sentences.chinese: 將白切肉片蘸蒜泥汁食用。

sentences.english: Can you squeeze any more juice from the lemon?
sentences.chinese: 你還能從那個檸檬榨出汁嗎？

sentences.english: I've washed the shirt twice and the ink still hasn't come out.
sentences.chinese: 這件襯衫我已洗兩遍了，但上面的墨水汁還是洗不掉。

sentences.english: Mash pickled plums, mix well with remaining seasoning and chopped ginger.
sentences.chinese: 壓爛梅子，拌入其餘酸梅汁材料及姜茸。

sentences.english: Experiment study of soak juice by tartary buckwheat bran the clarification technology and store the stabilities.
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了苦蕎麩浸出汁的澄清工藝及儲藏穩定性。

sentences.english: Just a little bit in a dressing spoils the whole salad?
sentences.chinese: 僅僅調料汁裏的一點點就弄糟了一整盤色拉？

sentences.english: Mix lime juice with ground drumstick pods and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 混合石灰汁與地面鼓槌吊艙和葉片。

sentences.english: Celery juice is tasted with faint scent and can increase people's appetite.
sentences.chinese: 芹菜汁芹菜味道清香，可以增強人的食慾。

sentences.english: The orange skin squirted in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 橘皮汁噴進了我的眼睛。

sentences.english: Leave an ox tongue in salt pickle.
sentences.chinese: 把牛口條放在醃菜汁裏醃製。

sentences.english: Referral groups do not eat papaya.

definition: dashi (soup stock used in Japanese cuisine) (orthographic borrowing from Japanese)
to mash/to beat to a pulp
